name: Facebook Hashtag Search
options: Max amount of results per keyword
special_instructions: Spaces or special characters in keyword list will bring no results
Keyword list is required for the tool to function
Results limit is the maximum amount of results per keyword
The tool returns data such as post text&URL, time of posting, basic poster info, image&video URLs, OCR text, likes, comments and shares count, and more
The tool does not return data that is not listed in the output fields
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
